title: Soul Screamers Volume Four
description: Saving the world has never come easy and Kaylee Cavanaugh's died to prove it.The final collection of New York Times bestselling author Rachel Vincent's Soul Screamers series is packed with emotion, with intrigue, with secrets, with family and above all, with love.Don't miss WITH ALL MY SOUL, FEARLESS and a brand-new novella, LAST REQUEST.
author: Rachel Vincent
